CustomField.description: Formula field used for the search Account option on the order details screen of the createSalesOrderV2 flow. Displaying Billing Address Information
CustomField.formula: Name + ', ' + ExternalCustomerId__c + ', ' + BillingStreet + ', ' + BillingCity + ', ' + BillingPostalCode + ', ' + NetsuiteCustomerNumber__c
CustomField.label: Order Flow Name
